name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WhatsWeb Privacy - For WhatsApp Chat Privacy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Messages On WhatsApp Web For Privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy way to stop people from peeking into your Whatsapp screen. Enhance your privacy on WhatsApp with the WhatsWeb Privacy Chrome extension. Take control of your messaging experience by customizing the display of various elements. Hide profile pictures, names, numbers, and more with a simple click, providing you with a discreet and personalized WhatsApp environment.

Key Features:

Hide Profile Pictures: Keep your chats private by hiding profile pictures.
Hide Names & Numbers: Anonymize conversations by hiding names and contact numbers.
Hide Last Message: Add an extra layer of privacy by hiding the last message in chats.
Hide Media & Gallery: Control the visibility of media and gallery content in chats.
Hide Group Members: Maintain group confidentiality by hiding the list of group members.
Hide Message Typing: Prevent others from seeing when you're typing a message.
Hide Full Chat: Customize your chat view by hiding the entire chat content.
Hide Chat List: Keep your conversations discreet by hiding the chat list.
Privacy and Security:
WhatsWeb Privacy prioritizes your privacy and ensures a secure browsing experience. All customization options are local to your browser and do not affect the actual content on WhatsApp servers.

Premium Features:
Unlock even more customization options and support the development of this extension by subscribing to our premium features. Enjoy an ad-free experience and additional privacy controls.

Note: WhatsWeb Privacy is not affiliated with WhatsApp and operates as an independent Chrome extension.
